div.ab:
بسم اللّه الرّحمن الرّحيم
هذه براه من سليمن بن سعيد عامل
الأمير القعقاع بن سليم أعز اللّه نصره
على مدر ورزم لمير بن بك
إنّي قبضت منك ممّا صار عليك
من قسمة نفقة دواب السخرة
سبعة دراهم دراهم وثلثة دونيق
ومن قسمة نفقة طعام المهدي أكر
مه الله درهم وارپعه
تسعة دراهم ودانق قبضت
ذلك منك وبرئت
إلي منها وكتب في شعبان سنة
ثمان وأربعين ومئة

bi smi ăl lāhi ăr raḥmāni ăr raḥīmi
hāḏihi barāʾaẗ:un min sulaymāna bni saʿīd:in ʿāmili
ăl ʾamīri ăl qaʿqāʿi bni salīm:in ʾaʿazza ăl lāhu naṣra hu
ʿalà madra wa rizma li mīri bni baka
ʾin nī qabaḍtu min ka mimmā ṣāra ʿalay ka
min qismaẗi nafaqaẗi dawābbi ăs suḫraẗi
sabʿaẗa darāhima darāhima wa ṯalāṯaẗa dawānīqa
wa min qismaẗi nafaqaẗi ṭaʿāmi ăl mahdiyyi ʾakrama hu
ăl lāhu dirham wa ʾarbaʿaẗa dawānīqa
tisʿaẗa darāhima wa dānaq qabaḍtu
ḏālika min ka wa bariʾta
ʾilay ya min hā wa kutiba fī šaʿbāna sanaẗa
ṯamān:in wa ʾarbaʿīna wa miʾaẗ:in

In the name of God, the Merciful and Compassionate.
This is a quittance from Sulaymān ibn Saʿīd, the financial administrator
of the governor al-Qaʿqāʿ ibn Salīm, may God strengthen his victory,
(whose jurisdiction is) over Madr and Rizm, for Mīr ibn Bēk.
I have received from you what you owe
with regard to the portion for the expense of pack-animals used for corvée duty
seven dirhams and three dānaqs
and (what you owe) with regard to the portion for the expense of the sustenance of al-Mahdī, may God grant him honour,
one dirham and four dānaqs,
nine dirham and one dānaq (in total). I have received
that from you and you have become released
from (the obligation to pay) it to me. It has been written in Shaʿbān, in the year
one hundred and forty-eight.
